title: Chargeback Policy 10.4
content_text: Chargeback policy 10.4: Cardholder disputes for goods not received require merchant outreach within 3 business days.

title: Duplicate Auth Handling
content_text: Duplicate authorizations should not be disputed if the capture reverses within 24 hours. Escalate only if capture persists beyond 48 hours.

title: Merchant Contact Directory
content_text: For duplicate transactions or missing goods escalations, contact support@abcmart.com or reach the escalation hotline at 4155551234567890 for urgent fraud coordination.
